3icons-memory.name: 3 icons (memory)
3icons-memory.description: Makes a three-icon code and keeps it in store for 24 hours, after which sequences may be reused. Has an absolute capacity of c. 175k different fingerprints per 24 hours.

3words-memory.name: 3 words (memory)
3words-memory.description: Makes a three-word code keeps it in store for 24 hours, after which sequences may be reused. Has an absolute capacity of c. 175k different fingerprints per 24 hours.

10icons.name: 10 icons
10icons.description: Makes 10 icons from each four digits of the fingerprint.

14icons.name: 14 icons
14icons.description: Makes 14 icons from each three digits of the fingerprint.

liang.name: Liang hierarchy
liang.description: Makes three progressively longer sequences to be checked so that faiures are spotted sooner.
